data.Title: Google Confirms Core Updates Impact AI Overviews
data.Description: Google's John Mueller has confirmed that core updates impact the search engine's AI-powered overviews.

data.Title: Baidu Blocks Google and Bing From Scraping Content
data.Description: Wikipedia-style service Baidu Baike recently barred the search engine crawlers of Google and Bing from indexing its online content.

data.Title: Perplexity Plans to Launch Ads in Q4
data.Description: A new advertiser pitch deck shows how the AI search startup hopes to win over advertisers later this year with new cross-platform formats.

data.Title: Google Analytics Experiences Data Outage
data.Description: Google Analytics experienced a temporary outage, with data not flowing in for a period of time.

data.Title: Google to Migrate All Merchants to Google Merchant Center Next in September
data.Description: Google is migrating all merchants to Google Merchant Center Next in September.

data.Title: Hardbacon Experiences Traffic Quadrupling After Bankruptcy Announcement
data.Description: Hardbacon, a Canadian personal finance company, saw their traffic quadruple after announcing bankruptcy.

data.Title: Google Updates Search Console Search Appearance Documentation
data.Description: Google Search Console search appearance documentation has been updated with new details.

data.Title: Google Search Local Pack Receives UX Update
data.Description: Google Search local pack has received a user experience update.

data.Title: Nofollow and Noindex Tags Don't Signify Low-Quality Pages
data.Description: Google's Martin Splitt has clarified that having a large number of nofollow or noindex tags on a website does not necessarily indicate low-quality pages.

data.Title: Bing Image Search Introduces Refinement Cards
data.Description: Microsoft has introduced refinement cards in Bing Image Search results, providing users with refinement options and example photos for their queries.

data.Title: Bing Image Creator Now Allows Landscape Image Generation
data.Description: Microsoft Bing Image Creator now allows users to generate landscape images using the built-in Resize option.

data.Title: Reddit Gains Advertiser Interest with Subreddit Targeting
data.Description: Reddit is attracting advertisers with its interest-based targeting approach, leveraging its vast network of subreddits to reach specific audiences.

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update: Gains and Reversals Reported
data.Description: The Google August 2024 core update is still rolling out, with some sites reporting gains vanishing or reversing in the past 24 hours.

data.Title: Unanswered Comments Don't Impact Google Search Rankings
data.Description: Google's Martin Splitt has confirmed that unanswered comments on a website do not negatively affect search rankings.

data.Title: Google's Updated Video SEO Documentation Highlights Content Refresh Strategies
data.Description: Google has updated its Video SEO documentation, providing guidance on when and how to refresh video content for improved search visibility.
